3572608 -- Road M50
Location:

Junction 2 both directions

Description:

Full closure 2100- 0500 for Coring and Deflectograph - 1. M50 Junction 2 Eastbound Exit Slip Traffic will continue on M50 Eastbound Carriageway, take the exit at Junction 1 and follow the diversion signs to get onto the WestBound Carriageway. The traffic will use the Exit Slip at Junction 2 and continue on intended journey. - 2. M50 Junction 2 Westbound Entry Slip Traffic will take the Eastbound Entry slip at Junction 2 onto the main carriageway and exit at Junction 1, and follow the diversion signs to get onto the Westbound Carriageway and continue on intended journey. - 3. M50 Junction 2 Eastbound Entry Slip Traffic will take the M50 Junction 2 Westbound Entry Slip, where they will exit off at Junction 3 and travel around to enter onto the M50 Eastbound Carriagway and contine on intended journey. - 4. M50 Junction 2 Westbound Exit Slip Traffic will continue on M50 Westbound Carriageway, taking the exit at Junction 3 and travel around to enter on to the M50 Eastbound Carriageway. Finally taking the Exit slip at Junction 2 to continue on intended journey.
